product_name: Dr. AltheaPore Refresh Grinding Cleansing Balm
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganSustainable PackagingDr. Althea Pore Refresh Grinding Cleansing Balm offers a deep yet gentle pore cleanse for all skin types with a hygienic grinding mechanism that ensures fresh, precise use. It thoroughly removes sebum and impurities from pores, leaving skin feeling clean and refreshed without residue.
details: DetailsBenefitsInnovative Grinding Packaging: Built-in grinder delivers fresh product with each hygienic and convenient use without direct hand contact with the product.Powerful Pore Cleansing: Infused with natural ingredients, this formula improves pore cleanliness by up to 99% after use for a clear, refreshed complexion.Powerful Yet Gentle Cleansing: Removes sunscreen, waterproof makeup products, and impurities both the surface and deep layers of your skin in one step without the need for double cleansing.Moisturizing Finish: Enriched with Madecassoside and plant-derived oils, it leaves your skin nourished and moisturized, and non-tightening finish.Clinically Proven for Sensitive Skin: Formulated without harsh irritants and proven safe for dedicate skin types.Key IngredientsCamellia Sinensis Leaf Extract: Helps control sebum, delivers powerful antioxidants, supports acne-prone skin, and deeply cleanses poresSoybean Oil: Naturally dissolves makeup and SPF while helping to clear clogged pores and supports the skin's moisture balance and protectionSodium Guaiazulene Sulfonate: Clams redness and soothes sensitive skin, and support gentle pore cleansing without causing irritation or discomfortItem 2647060How To UseTurn the container clockwise to dispense an appropriate amount.Gently massage onto dry skin in circular motions to dissolve makeup.Add a small amount of water to emulsify, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.IngredientsCetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Synthetic Wax, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, PEG-10 Isostearate, Polyglyceryl-2 Oleate, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate, Tocopherol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Caprylyl Glycol, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Water, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Water, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sodium Guaiazulene Sulfonate.
how_to_use: Turn the container clockwise to dispense an appropriate amount.Gently massage onto dry skin in circular motions to dissolve makeup.Add a small amount of water to emulsify, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
